## GridTools.GridViewProps interface

Props for the GridView component. Displays a single grid instance with resource editing capabilities.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface GridViewProps extends ViewBaseProps 
```
**Extends:** [ViewBaseProps](./ts-res-ui-components.viewstatetools.viewbaseprops.md)
